Nighstrike:

"Will you help me to patrol or not?" asked Nightstrike "Our mission 
is follow Megaron's commands.. and he said patrol"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::FireStrike::
> FireStrike stands still not answering Nightstrike, his brother.
> Megatron would be the only one to tell him what to do...and 
SwitchBlade.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > OOC: it's he
> >
> > BIC:
> >
> > Nighstrike:
> >
> > "Patrol and don't let that none Decepticon come in or leave our
> > territory" answered Nighstrike
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > ::FireStrike::
> > > FireStrike walked in behind Nightstrike as she left.
> > > "Your orders for me, SIR!"
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > > Nightstrike:
> > > >
> > > > "Yes, milord" said Nighstrike, who transformed and took off
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > > > > Megatron couldnt help but show a small smirk. This robot had
> > > > > determination, and respect. "Patrol our skies until I inform
> > you. I
> > > > want
> > > > > nothing none Decepticon entering, or leaving" he says 
darkly.
